subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Since Sidney Crosby sustained a high ankle sprain Jan. 18 against Tampa Bay, Evgeni Malkin — last season’s N.H.L. rookie of the year — has responded with several of the best games of his career.
snippet: Since Sidney Crosby sustained a high ankle sprain Jan. 18 against Tampa Bay, Evgeni Malkin — last season’s N.H.L. rookie of the year — has responded with several of the best games of his career.
